events.message: I received my order yesterday, but it was the wrong item and I would like to request a refund for the purchase.
The customer's message indicates a request for a refund due to receiving the wrong item, categorizing this under Refund.
Assigning the refund request case to the refunds specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I will assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 879654321 and I have attached a photo showing the item I got, which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and for processing the refund. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund has been processed successfully, and the case is now resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your service experience.
Since there has been no further issue reported, we have closed this case. Thank you for contacting support.
